verses.verse: And Jacob<WH3290> lifted up<WH5375> his eyes<WH5869>, and looked<WH7200>, and<WH6215>, behold, Esau was coming<WH935>, and with him four<WH702> hundred<WH3967> men<WH376>. And he divided<WH2673> the children<WH3206> unto Leah<WH3812>, and unto Rachel<WH7354>, and unto the two<WH8147> handmaids<WH8198>.
And he put<WH7760> the handmaids<WH8198> and their children<WH3206> foremost<WH7223>, and Leah<WH3812> and her children<WH3206> after<WH314>, and Rachel<WH7354> and Joseph<WH3130> hindermost<WH314>.
And he himself passed over<WH5674> before them<WH6440>, and bowed himself<WH7812> to the ground<WH776> seven<WH7651> times<WH6471>, until he came near<WH5066> to his brother<WH251>.
And Esau<WH6215> ran<WH7323> to meet him<WH7125>, and embraced<WH2263> him<WH5307>, and fell on his neck<WH6677>, and kissed him<WH5401>: and they wept<WH1058>.

And he lifted up<WH5375> his eyes<WH5869>, and saw<WH7200> the women<WH802> and the children<WH3206>; and said<WH559>, Who are these<WH428> with thee<WH559>? And he said, The children<WH3206> whom God<WH430> hath graciously given<WH2603> thy servant<WH5650>.
Then the handmaids<WH8198> came near<WH5066>, they and their children<WH3206>, and they bowed themselves<WH7812>.

And Leah<WH3812> also and her children<WH3206> came near<WH5066>, and bowed themselves<WH7812>: and after<WH310> came<WH5066> Joseph<WH3130> near<WH5066> and Rachel<WH7354>, and they bowed themselves<WH7812>.
And he said<WH559>, What meanest thou by all this company<WH4264> which I met<WH6298>? And he said<WH559>, To find<WH4672> favor<WH2580> in the sight<WH5869> of my lord<WH113>.
And Esau<WH6215> said<WH559>, I have<WH3426> enough<WH7227>, my brother<WH251>; let that which thou hast be thine.

And Jacob<WH3290> said<WH559>, Nay<WH4672>, I pray thee, if now I have found favor<WH2580> in thy sight<WH5869>, then receive<WH3947> my present<WH4503> at my hand<WH3027>; forasmuch as I have seen<WH7200> thy face<WH6440>, as one seeth the face<WH6440> of God<WH430>, and thou wast pleased with me<WH7521>.

Take <WH3947>, I pray thee<WH1293>, my gift that is brought<WH935> to thee<WH430>; because God hath dealt graciously with me<WH2603>, and because<WH3605> I have<WH3426> enough<WH3605>. And he urged<WH6484> him<WH3947>, and he took it.
And he said<WH559>, Let us take our journey<WH5265>, and let us go<WH3212>, and I will go before thee<WH3212>.

And he said<WH559> unto him<WH113>, My lord knoweth<WH3045> that the children<WH3206> are tender<WH7390>, and that the flocks<WH6629> and herds<WH1241> with me have their young<WH5763>: and if they overdrive<WH1849> them one<WH259> day<WH3117>, all the flocks<WH6629> will die<WH4191>.

Let my lord<WH113>, I pray thee<WH5674>, pass over before<WH6440> his servant<WH5650>: and I will lead on<WH5095> gently<WH328>, according to the pace<WH7272> of the cattle<WH4399> that are before me<WH6440> and according to the pace<WH7272> of the children<WH3206>, until I come<WH935> unto my lord<WH113> unto Seir<WH8165>.

And Esau<WH6215> said<WH559>, Let me now leave<WH3322> with thee some of the folk<WH5971> that are with me<WH559>. And he said, What<WH4100> needeth it<WH4672>? let me find favor<WH2580> in the sight<WH5869> of my lord<WH113>.
So Esau<WH6215> returned<WH7725> that day<WH3117> on his way<WH1870> unto Seir<WH8165>.

And Jacob<WH3290> journeyed<WH5265> to Succoth<WH5523>, and built<WH1129> him a house<WH1004>, and made<WH6213> booths<WH5521> for his cattle<WH4735>: therefore the name<WH8034> of the place<WH4725> is called<WH7121> Succoth<WH5523>.

And Jacob<WH3290> came<WH935> in peace<WH8004> to the city<WH5892> of Shechem<WH7927>, which is in the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>, when he came<WH935> from Paddan-aram<WH6307>; and encamped<WH2583> before<WH6440> the city<WH5892>.

And he bought<WH7069> the parcel<WH2513> of ground<WH7704>, where he had spread<WH5186> his tent<WH168>, at the hand<WH3027> of the children<WH1121> of Hamor<WH2544>, Shechem<WH7927>'s father<WH1>, for a hundred<WH3967> pieces of money<WH7192>.
And he erected<WH5324> there an altar<WH4196>, and called it<WH7121> El-Elohe<WH415>-Israel.
